purpleculture_pinyin:
xí
daughter-in-law
Невестка
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 息 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
媳妇 [ xí fù ]: daughter-in-law; wife (of a younger man); young married woman; young woman
儿媳 [ ér xí ]: daughter-in-law
婆媳 [ pó xí ]: mother-in-law and daughter-in-law
童养媳 [ tóng yǎng xí ]: child bride; girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
弟媳 [ dì xí ]: younger brother's wife; sister-in-law
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 息 [ xī ] to end, to cease, to put a stop to; pause, breath, rest; news

humanum_full_description_en:
From " female " to " rest " sound. " Daughter-in-law " means the son's wife. "Words. Women's Ministry: "Daughter-in-law, it is commonly said that a daughter-in-law is a daughter-in-law." Such as "Yuan Shi. Concubine Biography. Yuzong Huiren Yusheng Empress Bolan is also cowardly": "Later is filial, good deeds are in the palace, Shizu always called it a virtuous wife." "Jing Shi Tong Yan. "Miaoxianggong Drinks and Hates Banshantang": "The old concubine is a widow for twenty years, but she has no daughter-in-law, but she is with a maidservant."

" Daughter-in-law " also means the wife of a younger brother or another junior. For example, Chapter 104 of "A Dream of Red Mansions": "Although Sister Feng is a niece, she is doing housework and she also accompanied Baochai and others to deliver wine." Chapter 44 of "The Scholars": "Why don't you go for scientific research, you have your sister-in-law at home." Be home with my sister-in-law."

" Daughter-in-law " also generally refers to married women. Such as "Jing Shi Tong Yan. "Little Madam Money Gives Young People": "The three things that were paid out of the staff yesterday, the old wife found a relative, it's a rare coincidence!" Chapter 39 of "The Heroes of the Sons and Daughters": "Master Ann just walked to the Yong Road, early hope Seeing Lady Chu also dressed up, pulling his five- or six-year-old child, followed by a group of wives, young daughters-in-law, and girls, all greeted them from that door."
humanum_short_description_en: From " female " to " breath " sound. " Daughter-in-law " means the wife of the son, as well as the wives of the younger brother and other juniors.
humanum_full_description:
從「女」，「息」聲。「媳」表示兒子的妻子。《字彙．女部》：「媳，俗謂子婦為媳。」如《元史．后妃傳．裕宗徽仁裕聖皇后伯藍也怯赤》：「后性孝謹，善事中宮，世祖每稱之為賢德媳婦。」《警世通言．拗相公飲恨半山堂》：「老妾二十年孀婦，子媳俱無，止與一婢同處。」

　　「媳」也表示弟弟或其他晚輩的妻子。如《紅樓夢》第104回：「鳳姐雖是侄媳，現辦家事，也隨了寶釵等遞酒。」《儒林外史》第44回：「你科考去不妨，家裏有你嫂子和弟媳當着家。」

　　「媳」亦泛指已婚婦女。如《警世通言．小夫人金錢贈年少》：「昨日員外分付的三件事，老媳尋得一頭親，難得恁般湊巧！」《兒女英雄傳》第39回：「安老爺纔走到甬路上，早望見褚大娘子也打扮著，拉著他那個五六歲的孩子，後面還跟著一群老婆兒，小媳婦子，丫頭，都從那個門兒迎出來。」
humanum_short_description: 從「女」，「息」聲。「媳」表示兒子的妻子，也表示弟弟及其他晚輩的妻子。

Pinyin: xí
English Definition: daughter-in-law
Total strokes: 13; Radical: 女
Pictophonetic: 息 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 息 [ xī ] to end, to cease, to put a stop to; pause, breath, rest; news

媳字的基本解释

媳
xí
子、弟及其他晚辈的妻子：儿媳。弟媳。侄媳。孙媳。媳妇儿（fur ）。

媳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xí］
［《字彙》思積切］
(1)儿子的妻子。
(2)兄弟及其他晚辈的妻子，如弟媳、侄媳、孙媳。
(3)已婚女子的谦称。

媳字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媳； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页268第05
【字彙】思積切，音昔。俗謂子婦曰媳。　通作息。

媳字的源字形

媳字的起名意思

暂无。

Daughter-in-law
xí
Wives of sons, younger brothers and other younger generations: daughter-in-law. Sister-in-law. Nephew. Grandson-in-law. Daughter-in-law (fur).
Daughter-in-law
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xí］
[Thinking and cutting in "Words"]
(1) The son's wife.
(2) Wives of brothers and other younger generations, such as sister-in-law, nephew, grand-daughter-in-law.
(3) Modest name for married women.
Daughter-in-law

[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　Daughter-in-law; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 268 05
【Vocabulary】Thinking and cutting, sound Xi. It is said that Zi Fu is a daughter-in-law.　Through work and rest.

媳
形声字。女表意,其古文字形体像一一位女子,表示媳是女性;息(xi)表声,息有擎生义,表示儿媳生孙,繁衍不断生生
不已。本义是儿子的妻子。

xí
媳
媳。
Hた 上r
Невестка
Пиктофонетические символы.
Женщина выражает смысл, его древние символы напоминают женщину, указывая на то, что невестка - женщина; звук xi (xi) выражает смысл жизни, что означает, что невестка рожает внуков, и продолжает размножаться.
Первоначальное значение - жена сына.
①Жена сына: сын ~ "по ~. 2 младший брат или младшая жена: младший брат ~" племянник ~ "внук ~. ~ Женщины ~ жена ~ сын ~ племянник ~ внук ~ племянник ~ дети ~
Невестка
